Name: Sergeant Spark
Description: Once the most disciplined code commander in the WebtrES club, Sergeant Spark now stands as a testament to the resilience of data soldiers. His shiny yellow chassis, adorned with strategic buttons, commanded attention and respect among his pixelated peers. However, a fateful encounter with a rogue virus left his screen with an intricate web of cracks, a battle scar from safeguarding the digital realm. Despite his glitched display, Sergeant Spark's spirit remains unbroken, his arms still poised in steadfast readiness. He now mentors young programs in the art of cyber defense, his tale of valor inspiring a new generation of digital warriors.
